name: Dot Shots
description:
Take aim and fire at the dots! Dot Shot is a minimalistic game about shooting the correct dots at the right moment in time. Bounce off walls, avoid lasers, barriers and shoot the dots one by one as you proceed through 77 bouncy and joyful levels.

Features:-

-Gorgeous minimal graphics
-77 hand made levels
-Coordination enhancing enjoyment
-5 unique and relaxing themes
-Blissful beats by Ben Burns
-Good times!

Good luck and enjoy :)
